name: Big Slime Rush
description:
Controls: Use your mouse to rotate the platforms. Moving the mouse left rotates the platform to the left, moving the mouse right rotates the platform to the right. 

Try to escort this slime through a dangerous dungeon by rotating platforms for him and help him get to the cookie!

Made in 48hrs for GMTK Game Jam 2020 - "Out of Control"

Worked in a team with drawingwithliv, she did the great art you can find her at https://itch.io/profile/raisinbread or https://twitter.com/drawingwithliv

You can find me at https://twitter.com/dhafo_

Thanks for playing!
